title: Please help me. There is a problem with Korean server.
body:
nice to meet you :)****

I am a Korean user playing games on Korean servers. Why did you come here and ask a question?

I have a big problem with my Korean server now.

In the Korean server, it is said that from 2016 season reward it is 3vs3 Twisted Treeline team rank, and although the reward of season is received, the loading screen frame is shown also in Summoner's Rift or Summoner's Rift ai. (Attached photo of evidence.)

Even if you ask the Korean operator, it is clear that the loading screen border is displayed in the 5 vs 5 Summoner's Rift or 5vs5 Summoner's Rift ai even if you get the season reward with a 3 to 3 Twisted Treeline team rank. (Attached photo of evidence.)

But when the reward came in, I found that the border was not visible in the 5vs5 Summoner's Rift game. So, if you have a suggestion on the homepage of the Korean operator about how this happened, there is no answer for one week already, and the other user who received the 3vs3 Twisted Treeline compensation also suggested, but does not give any compensation.

I did not run the solorank after I found that the 3vs3 Twisted Treeline reward now shows the border in the 5vs5 Summoner 's Rift game.

It is really sad.

It was nothing that I suffered during this season. It is a reward that I got from trying hard, but suddenly the words have changed and I did not pay the right compensation.

please.

Help 3vs3 rewarded users

They did not receive the appropriate compensation at any one moment for no apparent reason.

Please help ... I have also put in one-to-one inquiries, but this is a North American server. If the rewards have changed, do not you have to tell them before the rewards come in? I hope you get the right rewards soon.

Evidence
1. https://riotgames.zendesk.com/attachments/token/bB2JJ5JexNz8yy53YGV5qXaiM/?name=question.png
2. https://riotgames.zendesk.com/attachments/token/y0a5c5usx08HJdZVPbUb3Gq9S/?name=answer.jpg
3. https://riotgames.zendesk.com/attachments/token/1KGvDD5c7T8rIS4XRCKnBmH8c/?name=2016+season+reward+details.jpg
4. https://riotgames.zendesk.com/attachments/token/6AiRdA62l7KztDIFoCDiXuclK/?name=2016+season+reward+details+original.jpg

replies.body:
Since you're experiencing this issue on the Korean region, you'll need to work with the support team for that region. We don't have access to their tools nor can we read Korean, so you'll want to reach out with [this link](http://leagueoflegends.co.kr/Customer/qna_login.php) if you haven't already.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Korea server is seems doesn't intend to help at all. So show off to come. How can I? I don't sleep because bitter.
